# This file is generated by the script SetUpCtestFiles.py
# If possible, modify the script to fix any issues with the CMakeLists.txt files
# Or you can remove this header line to prevent this file from being overwritten

file(COPY  README capacitor.cir capacitor.cir.sh op_test.cir op_test.cir.sh tags DESTINATION ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR})
file(CHMOD ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/capacitor.cir.sh PERMISSIONS OWNER_READ OWNER_WRITE OWNER_EXECUTE GROUP_READ GROUP_EXECUTE WORLD_READ WORLD_EXECUTE)
file(CHMOD ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/op_test.cir.sh PERMISSIONS OWNER_READ OWNER_WRITE OWNER_EXECUTE GROUP_READ GROUP_EXECUTE WORLD_READ WORLD_EXECUTE)
if( (NOT Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI) AND PERL_FOUND )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_80/capacitor.cir.sh COMMAND perl -I${XyceRegressionTestScripts} capacitor.cir.sh ${XYCE_BINARY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} capacitor.cir ${OutputDataDir}/Certification_Tests/BUG_80/capacitor.cir.prn )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_80/capacitor.cir.sh PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;errorexit")
endif()
if( (NOT Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI) AND PERL_FOUND )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_80/op_test.cir.sh COMMAND perl -I${XyceRegressionTestScripts} op_test.cir.sh ${XYCE_BINARY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} op_test.cir ${OutputDataDir}/Certification_Tests/BUG_80/op_test.cir.prn )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_80/op_test.cir.sh PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;errorexit")
endif()
